short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically organizes open tabs into categorized groups based on their content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Smart Tab Organizer extension for Google Chrome automatically organizes your open tabs into categorized groups based on their content. This helps users maintain a cleaner and more efficient browsing experience by reducing clutter. The extension intelligently categorizes and groups similar tabs, making it easier to navigate and manage multiple tabs simultaneously.
